Specimen Type: Whole blood, buccal swab, or saliva
Purpose: To detect genetic variants (e.g., HLA-B*15:02) associated with hypersensitivity to carbamazepine.
Container: EDTA blood collection tube, buccal swab, or saliva collection kit
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, thermocycler, and genotyping platform (real-time PCR or sequencing instrument)
